  • Constructor Details

    • Train

      public Train(String trainNum, Line currentLine, String direction)
      A constructor to create a train object with a train number, current line, and direction
      Parameters:
      trainNum - a string of the train's unique number
      currentLine - a Line object which the train is currently on
      direction - a string representing the direction that the train is travelling in currently

    • getCurrentStationCode

      public String getCurrentStationCode()
      Returns the code of the current station. If the current station is not set, returns null.
      Returns:
      the station code of the current station, or null if no current station is set
